name: Wayne Eberly
content: Wayne Eberly Wayne Eberly Professor, Department of Computer Science University of Calgary 2500 University Drive NW Calgary, Alberta, Canada  T2N 1N4 Office: ICT 613 Telephone: (403) 220-5073 Email: eberly@ucalgary.ca URL: https://cspages.ucalgary.ca/~eberly/ Research and Teaching In the past, my research has concerned the design and analysis of algorithms for computations in computer algebra. Teaching has included topics in the design and analysis of algorithms and in theoretical computer science. As for the future? The pandemic brought opportunities along with challenges. We’ll see where things go. Service I have let it be known that I should update my business cards to add “addled old fart” to my list of duties. Many organizations have them. The argument can be made that they serve useful roles. I have decided to own it. It is possible that I also have an interesting sense of humour. Oh, yes, I have held a variety of service roles in support of undergraduate instruction, over the years. Support for “academic integrity” is a current focus. News June 2, 2025: Links to Fall, 2025 courses have been added. I hope to continue work on these but also to update the rest of my web site over the summer! This page was most recently changed on Sunday, June 1, 2025 by Wayne Eberly. wayne eberly computer science faculty of science u of c Research Readings on Analysis of Algorithms CPSC 351 Fall 2025 CPSC 511/611 Fall 2025
